All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Ball
Class to define the Ball
BallHit
Class to deal with the collision between the Hero and the Ball
BallTiming
Class to determine the frequency of the balls falling
Coin
Class to define the Coin
CoinHit
Class to deal with the collision between the coin and the Hero
CoinTiming
Class to determine the frequency of the coins falling
ControlPanel
Class to define the Control Panel
Game
Main game entry point
GameLevel
an abstract class that is the base of all the levels
GameView
A class to set the view of the Game
GiveFocus  
Hero
Class for creating the main character
HeroController
Class to control the Hero
Level1
Class for Level 1 of the game
Level2
Class for level 2 of the game
Level3
Class for level 3 of the game
PolygonEditor
Very basic polygon editor.
SettingsPanel
Class to define the Settings Panel
